data.name: HackingBall3D
data.detailed_description:
Unknown terrorist organization has activated a dirty nuclear bomb. Your mind was put into the program in the form of a ball. Your task is to collect data and hack the control unit of the bomb, then turn off the explosion timer.
HackingBall3D - an exciting game with riddles and calculated interaction of objects.
- The player controls the ball and collects data, solve 3D puzzles with real physics.
- Each level is traversed for a time, which at the end of the level is subtracted from the amount of collected data.
- Immerse yourself in the world of the MATRIX.
- Save the world
